name: Mars 2025
description:
Welcome to Mars 2025, a game made in less than a month for Erstel's June Month Jam. The theme was '2025', so I made a game set on Mars in the near future. 

When humans tried to colonize Mars, they realized they were late, so they sent you to... convince the aliens to leave.

The map is procedurally generated, so no two playthroughs will be the same. The game has weapon pickups, boss battles and more. Feedback is welcome but I won't develop the game any further. 

The Credits button is broken, so I'll just leave them here:

  • Programming, Art & SFX - Daniel Abeleira, a.k.a. Delthor Games, a.k.a. me
  • Music - Minor Seven
